GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article-id.description: serves an article object, that matches an id provided

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments corresponding with the correct article ID

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a comment to an article, based on the article ID, responds with the posted comment object

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Updates an article with a provided "patch" object

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Deletes a comment, selected through a provided ID
